headline: Exelon (EXC): Exploring Valuation After Fresh Analyst Optimism and Growing Institutional Interest
summary: Exelon (EXC) caught attention after Evercore ISI Group kicked off its coverage with an Outperform rating, reflecting a rising sense of optimism from the analyst community. This move has prompted fresh investor curiosity around the stock. See our latest analysis for Exelon. Exelon's share price has drawn fresh attention this year, climbing 24% year-to-date and notching a 2.4% gain in just the last day as upbeat analyst ratings and new customer-focused initiatives, such as expanded assistance...
